PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... egalitarian 主张人人平等的 totalitarian 极权主义的 utilitarian 功利的，实利的.
SAT-填空题OG - 豆丁网 ... dictator 独裁者 totalitarian 极权主义者 (发音似“托塔李天王” - topple 不稳而倒下.
极权政权（Totalitarian）通常是一个人（独裁者）决策。寡头政权（Oligarchy）是一小撮人决策。
2009年6月30日 - 这两种政治势力之间存在着持续的紧张与冲突,这样的对峙与冲突是社会主义极权(Totalitarian)国家进入变革转型阶段必然会经历的政治现象。这两种力量均力求.

list.abs: The imposing monolith of totalitarian states obscures their latent weaknesses ., 极权国家外表堂堂的铁板一块掩盖了它们内在的虚弱.

democracy be no peace at all , China is a totalitarian dictatorship of the country , a freedom , democracy and human rights still hold a hostile towards the country .没有民主就没有和平可言，中国是一个极权独裁的国家，一个对自由、民主及人权仍抱持著敌视态度的国家。
any effective opposition to a totalitarian regime must be secretive and cellular ;, 任何对极权政体的有效反抗都必须是秘密的和分成单元的;
...极权民主（totalitarian democracy），一种假扮民主的绝对专制形态，其基础是领袖或执政集团声称拥有意识形态的全部解释权。这类政权证明其民主的依据是宣称领袖或执政集团——并且是领袖或执政集团自己——能够代表人民的真正利益，这就意味着“真正”的民主可以等同于绝对专制。citation|title=Polit.

entry.def: A totalitarian political system is one in which there is only one political party which controls everything and does not allow any opposition parties.

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by a government in which the political authority exercises absolute and centralized control;

sentences.sentence: "a totalitarian regime crushes all autonomous institutions in its drive to seize the human soul"- Arthur M.Schlesinger, Jr.

means.word_mean: 2. of or relating to the principles of totalitarianism according to which the state regulates every realm of life;
